A bacteria population doubles every 3 hours. If there are initially 100 bacteria, how many will there be after 12 hours?
Find the sum of the infinite geometric series: 1 + 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ...
Prove that the square root of 2 is irrational.
answer: Proof by contradiction: Assume √2 is rational, then √2 = p/q where p,q are integers with no common factors. Then 2 = p²/q², so 2q² = p². This means p² is even, so p is even. Let p = 2k, then 2q² = 4k², so q² = 2k². This means q² is even, so q is even. But this contradicts our assumption that p and q have no common factors. Therefore √2 is irrational.

problem: Find the maximum value of f(x) = -x² + 4x + 1 on the interval [0, 5].
